sen.j: 大宮通り（おおみやどおり）は、奈良県奈良市にある街路。
sen.e: Omiya-dori Street is a boulevard in Nara City, Nara Prefecture.
Omiya-dori Street is a boulevard in Nara City, Nara Prefecture.
Omiya-dori Street is a boulevard in Nara City, Nara Prefecture.

sen.j: 奈良市の東西のメインストリートであり、奈良市宝来町から近鉄奈良駅前まで至る。
sen.e: Hanayacho-dori Street runs from Nishi-Kyogoku Station on Kadonooji-dori Street at east and west to Tominokoji-dori Street.
Hanayacho-dori Street runs from Nishi-Kyogoku Station on Kadonooji-dori Street in the east and west to Tominokoji-dori Street.
It is a main street of Nara City running east-west from Horai-cho, Nara City to Kintetsu Nara Station.
sen.cmt: 訳文が全く異なる内容のため、原文に基づき新たに訳出しました。

sen.j: なお、宝来町より西は阪奈道路、近鉄奈良駅以東は登大路と名を変える。
sen.e: And the name changes to Hanna Road heading west from Horaicho, and to Nobori oji heading east from Kintetsu Nara Station.
The name changes to Hanna Road heading west from Horaicho, and Nobori oji heading east from Kintetsu Nara Station.
The name changes to "Hanna Road" heading west from Horai-cho, and "Nobori-oji" heading east from Kintetsu Nara Station.
sen.cmt: Horai-choとし、「阪奈道路」と「登大路」にクォーテーションをつけ、後の表記に統一し"Nobori-oji"としました。

sen.j: 本稿では、登大路についても記す。
sen.e: This section also describe about Nobori oji.
This section will also describe Nobori oji.
This section will also describe Nobori-oji.

sen.j: 大阪と奈良を結ぶ幹線である阪奈道路は、1958年12月25日に開通した当初は三条通りと接続していた。
sen.e: The Hanna Road is a highway which connects Osaka and Nara, it used to connect to Sanjo-dori Street which was opened December 25, 1958 at the time.
Hanna Road is a highway which connects Osaka and Nara, and used to connect to Sanjo-dori Street which opened on December 25, 1958.
Hanna Road is a highway which connects Osaka and Nara, and used to connect to Sanjo-dori Street which opened on December 25, 1958.

sen.j: しかし、阪奈道路の規模に対して、三条通りはあまりに狭く、渋滞は不可避であった。
sen.e: But Sanjo-dori Street was very narrow against the scale of Hanna Road, so it was impossible to avoid the traffic.
Due to its extremely narrow wideth compared to Hanna road, Sanjo-dori Street became congested with traffic.
Due to its extremely narrow width compared to Hanna road, Sanjo-dori Street became congested with traffic.

sen.j: また、同時に大阪万国博覧会開催に向けて、近鉄奈良線の地下化が進められていた。
sen.e: Also at same time, it proceeded a plan to make Kintetsu Nara line in underground for opening of Expo '70.
At the same time, a plan was commenced to open the underground Kintetsu Nara line in time for the Expo '70.
At the same time, a plan was commenced to open the underground Kintetsu Nara line in time for the Expo '70.

sen.j: 近鉄奈良線地下化事業とリンクして、登大路の拡張及び大宮道路（現大宮通り）建設が計画され、昭和44年に開通した。
sen.e: It linked to the project of underground of Kintetsu Nara Line, and it planned to extend Nobori-oji and establish Omiya Road (current Omiya-dori Street), it opened in 1969.
It linked with the underground project for the Kintetsu Nara Line, and was planned to extend Nobori-oji and establish Omiya Road (current Omiya-dori Street). It was opened in 1969.
It linked with the underground project for the Kintetsu Nara Line, and was planned to extend Nobori-oji and establish Omiya Road (current Omiya-dori Street). It was opened in 1969.

sen.j: また、同時期に国道24号線奈良バイパスが開通し、奈良市の交通事情は一変することになる。
sen.e: Also at same time, the National Road No. 24 was opened the traffic circumstance in Nara City had changed.
sen.cmt: 奈良バイパス→Nara Bypass[定訳不明]
sen.e: At the same time, National Road No. 24 was opened and traffic in Nara City was transformed.
At the same time, National Road No. 24 was opened and traffic in Nara City was transformed.
sen.cmt: 余分なスペースを削除

sen.j: 開通当初は、国鉄（現JR）関西本線以西の大宮通り沿いは田畑が広がる田園地帯であった（いくつか集落はあった）が、近鉄奈良線に新大宮駅が開業すると、付近は新都心として発展し、市役所が旧市街より移転するとその傾向に拍車がかかり、オフィスや商業施設、百貨店などが林立することとなった。
sen.e: When it was opened, there were the field area along Omiya-dori Street heading east from Kansai Honsen Line, Japanese National Railways (current JR), but once Shin-Omiya Station opened at Kintetsu Nara Line, the neighborhood developed as the new city, the relocation of the city hall from former city was tend to accelerated that, then offices, business facilities, and department stores lined up there.

When it was opened, there were fields along Omiya-dori Street heading east from Kansai Honsen Line, Japanese National Railways (current JR), but once Shin-Omiya Station opened along the Kintetsu Nara Line, the neighborhood developed into a new city, and as the city hall was relocated from the former city, offices, business facilities, and department stores began to develop.

When it was opened, there were fields along Omiya-dori Street heading east from the Kansai Main Line, Japanese National Railways (current JR), but once Shin-Omiya Station opened along the Kintetsu Nara Line, the neighborhood developed into a new city, and as the city hall was relocated from the former city, offices, business facilities, and department stores began to develop.
sen.cmt: Kansai Main Lineとしました。"Kansai Main Line"→"the Kansai Main Line"に変更しました。

sen.j: 特に、金融機関の集積が目立つ。
sen.e: Especially it's noticeable that many financial institutes are gathering.
sen.cmt: 二条大路南1丁目交差点→Nijo-oji Minami 1-chome Crossing[定訳不明]
sen.e: Of special note is the concentration of financial institutions.
Of special note is the concentration of financial institutions.

sen.j: また、二条大路南1丁目交差点以西もロードサイドショップ等で賑わっている。
sen.e: Also the heading west from Nijo-oji Minami 1-chome crossing is bustling with roadside shop and so on.
Heading west from the Nijo-oji Minami 1-chome intersection, the road bustles with shops etc.
Heading west from the Nijo-oji Minami 1-chome intersection, the road bustles with shops etc.

sen.j: 元々渋滞緩和のために建設された大宮通りであったが、急速なモータリゼーションには対応しきれず、最近では慢性的に宝来町から二条大路南1丁目交差点までが渋滞している。
sen.e: Originally Omiya-dori Street was built for reducing the traffic, but it couldn't keep up with quick motorization, recently there is the traffic jam confirmed from Horai-cho to Nijo-oji Minami 1-chome crossing.

Originally Omiya-dori Street was built to reduce traffic, but couldn't keep up with the pace of motorization, and recently traffic jams occur starting at the Horai-cho to Nijo-oji Minami 1-chome intersection.

Originally Omiya-dori Street was built to reduce traffic, but couldn't keep up with the pace of motorization, and recently traffic jams occur starting at the Horai-cho to Nijo-oji Minami 1-chome intersection.

sen.j: このため、新たに宝来町から三条大路にかけての区間を、片側2車線の高架道路を含む片側4車線の道路に拡幅し、さらに片側2車線に拡幅される三条通りに接続する道路も建設される予定である。
sen.e: Because of that, the section which is from Horaicho to Sanjo-oji was newly expanded to 4 driveways on one side which is included the highway with 2 driveway on one side, and it plans to build a connection road to Sanjo-dori Street which suppose to expand to 2 driveway on one side.

Due to this fact, the section from Horaicho to Sanjo-oji was newly expanded to include 4 lanes on each side, which included a highway with 2 lanes on each side, with plans to build a connecting road to Sanjo-dori Steet, and is supposed to be expanded to include 2 lanes on each side.

Due to this fact, the section from Horaicho to Sanjo-oji was newly expanded to include four lanes on each side, which included a highway with two lanes on each side, with plans to build a connecting road to Sanjo-dori Steet, and is supposed to be expanded to include two lanes on each side.

sen.j: これにより、阪奈道路で奈良市内に向かう車両は大宮通りと三条通りの両方からアクセスできるようになり、大宮通りの渋滞の緩和が期待されている。
sen.e: So, the cars which go to Nara City on Hanna-road are possible to access from both street which is Omiya-dori Street and Sanjo-dori Street, it expect to reduce the traffic jam.
This would allow cars travelling froom Nara City through Hanna-road access from both street Omiya-dori Street and Sanjo-dori Street, and is expected to reduce congestion.
This would allow cars travelling froom Nara City through Hanna Road access from both street Omiya-dori Street and Sanjo-dori Street, and is expected to reduce congestion.
sen.cmt: 他と表記を合わせ、Hanna Roadとしました。

sen.j: 近鉄奈良駅より奈良公園を東西に横断して春日大社に至る。

It runs from Kintetsu Nara Station and across the Nara Park to east and south, to the Kasuga Taisha Shrine.
